title: Card Issuing
description: Issue debit, credit, or prepaid cards and enjoy up to 1.5% cashback rewards on purchases worldwide. Experience the convenience of global transactions with unparalleled rewards.

title: Interest and Savings
description: Achieve up to 10% annual interest on your savings. Enjoy daily compounded returns on all your deposits, ensuring your money grows effortlessly.

title: Cash or Bank
description: With MoneyGram integration, deposit or withdraw cash instantly without fees, anywhere in the world. Experience hassle-free transactions with the reliability you trust.

title: Direct Deposit
description: Enjoy instant deposits and withdrawals with no fees using your existing bank accounts. Plaid's seamless integration ensures quick and cost-effective transactions.

title: Instant Transactions
description: Send or receive funds anywhere in the world with transactions settled in seconds. Enjoy the efficiency of instant transfers across borders.

title: RWAs and Forex
description: Manage your wealth in multiple currencies. Effortlessly swap or convert currencies to fit your financial needs and preferences, all at your fingertips.

title: Security and Persistance
subheader: Never lose access to your funds
description: Utilizing multisig and smart contract wallets, powered by Stellar, never lose access to your funds while still remaining in your custody
